block.title: Activate NMON Monitoring for local host
block.text: If you want to collect local NMON data, activate this script input (for AIX / Linux / Solaris)
Interval execution (cron or interval in seconds)

block.title: Activate NMON Cleaner for local host
block.text: This script will prevent from having undeleted empty csv files in repository which may happens sometimes if Splunk does not delete them
To prevent having useless files monitored by Splunk and stored in repository, this script should be scheduled to run at least once per day
Interval execution (cron or interval in seconds)

block.title: NMON Inventory Data Generation
block.text: This savedsearch will generate the csv lookup table containing NMON Inventory data (configuration elements of known hosts)
NMON Inventory data is being used as a datasource in Inventory interfaces and OS type filtering
It is recommended to run this savedsearch at least once per day, but you can also run it every hour or whatever you like
IMPORTANT: Before you can use OS filtering within interfaces, you need to run it manually first, or wait for the schedule to run it for you
